name: 劉慧雯
objective:
本課程目的在於培養學生學術寫作與表達技巧及跨領域學習的能力。閱讀各領域學術論文，有效掌握學術文章閱讀技巧；透過學術論文寫作架構，學習學術英文句型與用字。
This course aims to develop students’ academic writing skills and cultivate the potential for cross-disciplinary learning. By reading academic articles in various fields, students not only can effectively master the reading skills needed to efficiently read academic articles but also acquire essential sentence patterns, and vocabulary for academic writing.
schedule:

9/22   Unit 1
9/29   Unit 2

11/10  Presentation 2
